body:
**Your solicitor**

A solicitor can give you legal advice about miscarriage of justice compensation.  You can find solicitors in your area [here](https://solicitors.lawsociety.org.uk/)

**Law centres**

Law centres have solicitors and other advisers who can give you free legal advice. You can find law centres in your area [here](https://www.lawcentres.org.uk/policy-and-media/the-case-for-law-centres)

**Citizens Advice**

Citizens Advice offers free advice on a wide range of issues. They can give advice over the phone or in person at a local bureau. You can find Citizens advice in your area [here](https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/)
heading: To get compensation your conviction must have been overturned at an appeal or retrial
lede: You can get help and advice if you are in any doubt regarding your legal rights
